test.subject: english
test.name: Tiếng Anh 10 - Unit 9: Protecting the Environment
test.description: Kiểm tra từ vựng về Bảo vệ môi trường và ngữ pháp Câu tường thuật (Reported Speech).

questions.question: Choose the word whose underlined part is pronounced differently.
questions.explanation: Question (/tʃən/). Các từ còn lại (/ʃən/).

questions.question: Choose the word with a different stress pattern.
questions.explanation: Pollution nhấn âm 2. Các từ còn lại nhấn âm 1.

questions.question: Global warming has a negative ________ on our climate.
questions.explanation: Have an impact on: có tác động lên.

questions.question: She said that she ________ busy then.
questions.explanation: Câu tường thuật lùi thì: 'is' -> 'was' (do chủ ngữ 'she').

questions.question: Many animals are losing their natural ________ due to deforestation.
questions.explanation: Natural habitats: môi trường sống tự nhiên.

questions.question: Tom told me that he ________ visit his grandparents the following day.
questions.explanation: Tường thuật 'tomorrow' -> 'the following day', nên 'will' -> 'would'.

questions.question: We should stop cutting down trees to preserve ________.
questions.explanation: Preserve biodiversity: bảo tồn đa dạng sinh học.

questions.question: He asked me where I ________ from.
questions.explanation: Câu hỏi tường thuật (Wh-question): lùi thì (come -> came).

questions.question: Illegal hunting can lead to the ________ of rare animals.
questions.explanation: Lead to extinction: dẫn đến sự tuyệt chủng.

questions.question: The teacher asked the students if they ________ their homework.
questions.explanation: Tường thuật câu hỏi Yes/No. Lùi thì: Past Simple/Present Perfect -> Past Perfect.

questions.question: ________ is the increase in the earth's temperature.
questions.explanation: Định nghĩa của Global warming.

questions.question: Nam said: 'I am reading a book.' -> Nam said that he ________ a book.
questions.explanation: Present Continuous (am reading) -> Past Continuous (was reading).

questions.question: Plastic bags take many years to ________.
questions.explanation: Decompose: phân hủy.

questions.question: Lan asked Mai: 'Do you like pop music?' -> Lan asked Mai ________ she liked pop music.
questions.explanation: Câu hỏi Yes/No trong gián tiếp dùng 'if' hoặc 'whether'.

questions.question: We need to ________ natural resources for future generations.
questions.explanation: Conserve: bảo tồn.

questions.question: Identify the error: 'He said me that he was tired.'
questions.explanation: Sai dùng 'said me'. Phải là 'told me' hoặc 'said to me'.

questions.question: Sea levels are rising because the polar ice caps are ________.
questions.explanation: Melting: tan chảy.

questions.question: My father said: 'I will repair the bike tomorrow.' -> My father said he would repair the bike ________.
questions.explanation: Tomorrow -> the next day / the following day.

questions.question: Using public transport is a good way to reduce ________.
questions.explanation: Reduce emissions: giảm khí thải.

questions.question: The reporter announced that the forest fire ________ under control.
questions.explanation: Lùi thì: is -> was.
